content:
That sounds like an amazing experience! I'm happy to help you find some new Salsa dance studios in the city.

Can you tell me a bit more about what you're looking for in a studio? Are you interested in a specific style of Salsa, such as On1, On2, or Cuban? Are you a beginner or more advanced?

Also, what's your preferred location in the city? Are you looking for studios that are close to your work or home?

Lastly, what did you enjoy most about the dance workshop you attended last weekend? Was there a particular instructor or style that stood out to you?

Let me know and I can give you some personalized recommendations for Salsa studios in the city that fit your needs!
